thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 26 of 7354
thread.title: theresa

author: theresa
title: theresa
text: I was pleasantly surprised to find a particular item that I was looking for at multiple sellers' sites was available at B&H at a lower cost and with free expedited shipping! In addition, since the B&H site seemed to have everything, I searched for a few things that I had been looking for over the last few months and found that these items were also readily available from B&H. I will definitely be a repeat customer in the near future!
